metadata.title: CVE-2017-8343 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - negligible
metadata.description:
In ImageMagick 7.0.5-5, the ReadAAIImage function in aai.c allows attackersto cause a denial of service (memory leak) via a crafted file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-8343` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

imagemagick - 8:6.7.7.10-6ubuntu3.7
imagemagick-common - 8:6.7.7.10-6ubuntu3.7
libmagick++5 - 8:6.7.7.10-6ubuntu3.7
libmagickcore5 - 8:6.7.7.10-6ubuntu3.7
libmagickcore5-extra - 8:6.7.7.10-6ubuntu3.7
libmagickwand5 - 8:6.7.7.10-6ubuntu3.7
perlmagick - 8:6.7.7.10-6ubuntu3.7
No subscription required

criterions.comment: imagemagick package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '8:6.7.7.10-6ubuntu3.7').
